question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-compiler-v2/src/env_pipeline/spec_checker.rs] [Function: run_spec_checker()] [Pureness bypass] Can an attacker craft Move modules where the RewritingScope::CompilationTarget filter excludes malicious spec functions from pureness checking, allowing impure specifications to bypass validation and break formal verification guarantees?
